## New input1:
```java
    String sql = "CREATE TABLE orders_p4 PARTITION OF orders\n" + "    FOR VALUES WITH (MODULUS 4, REMAINDER 3);";
```
Explanation: This input is valid because it maintains the original SQL statement structure and does not contain any unnecessary spaces or special characters.
